channel.title: Homes on Michael Campfield | Mythre
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Michael Campfield | Mythre

item.description: Professional Biography For over fifteen years I’ve worked as a professional computer scientist, with a focus on Linux systems administration. In 2015 I began working with the U.S. Department of Energy’s (DOE) Oak Ridge National Lab (ORNL). Currently I’m part of the Research and Development group supporting the Neutron Sciences Directorate’s research programs at the Spallation Neutron Source and High Flux Isotope Reactor. While at ORNL I’ve also been a member of the Systems Operations group at the National Center for Computational Sciences (NCCS) home of the Titan and upcoming Summit supercomputers.
